name: Let Me Explain
description:
Game submited for 34th edition of Ludum Dare, which had two topics: "Growth", and "Two button controls".

You can play this game by pressing right or left mouse button to make your choices, or you can use left/right arrow keys alternatively.

Unfortunatelly we couldn't fit the entire plot to the Ludum Dare strict timetable, so we're gonna release this game with complete story after the event.

Please check our submission page and rate game there :)
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...
